Name: NEKOPALIVE
About the game: WHAT WAS ORIGINALLY A APRIL FOOLS' PRANK, HAS NOW BECOME THE PURRFECT VR SHOWCASE! What's NEKOPALIVE? Why, it's a 'cat-certo'! The catgirls of La Soleil take to the stage and step into the spotlight with their very own live concert. Dancing, singing, MIX'ing, and purring, this is the NEKOPARA event that comes right home to you, and you've got the best seat in the house! No idol can compare to a catgirl, nyaaa~ With full support of VR devices, this interactive concert allows you to jump into the venue in full 3D and zoom, pan, tilt and gaze at the beautiful graphics and fun choreography. Grab your glowsticks and prepare for 'otagei', because this is your chance to experience NEKOPARA as if it was real and right there in front of you. Songs include Thump Thump ☆ Heart-Throbbing ☆ Flavor [トキドキ☆ココロ☆フレーバー] and 100% Meow Power Nyantasy [100にゃんパワーで夢心地]
Meta Title: NEKOPALIVE: May 31, 2016, NEKO WORKs and Full Overview
